verses.verse: And it came to pass at that time <WH6256>, that Judah <WH3063> went down <WH3381> from his brothers <WH251>, and turned <WH5186> in to a certain <WH376> Adullamite <WH5726>, whose name <WH8034> was Hirah <WH2437>.

And she conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Er <WH6147>.
And she conceived <WH2029> again <WH3205>, and gave birth to a son <WH1121>; and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Onan <WH209>.

And she yet again conceived <WH3254>, and gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Shelah <WH7956>: and he was at Chezib <WH3580>, when she gave birth to him <WH3205>.
And Judah <WH3063> took <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for Er <WH6147> his firstborn <WH1060>, whose name <WH8034> was Tamar <WH8559>.
And Er <WH6147>, Judah <WH3063>'s firstborn <WH1060>, was wicked <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068>; and the Lord <WH3068> killed him <WH4191>.
And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> unto Onan <WH209>, Go in <WH935> unto your brother <WH251>'s wife <WH802>, and marry <WH2992> her <WH6965>, and raise up seed <WH2233> to your brother <WH251>.

And Onan <WH209> knew <WH3045> that the seed <WH2233> should not be his <WH518>; and it came to pass, when he went in <WH935> unto his brother <WH251>'s wife <WH802>, that he spilled <WH7843> it on the ground <WH776>, lest <WH1115> that he should give <WH5414> seed <WH2233> to his brother <WH251>.
And the thing which <WH834> he did <WH6213> displeased <WH3415> the Lord <WH3068>: therefore he killed him also <WH4191>.

Then said <WH559> Judah <WH3063> to Tamar <WH8559> his daughter in law <WH3618>, Remain <WH3427> a widow <WH490> at your father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, until Shelah <WH7956> my son <WH1121> be grown <WH1431>: for he said <WH559>, What if he die <WH4191> also <WH251>, as his brothers did <WH8559>? And Tamar went <WH3212> and lived <WH3427> in her father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>.

And in process <WH7235> of time <WH3117> the daughter <WH1323> of Shuah <WH7770> Judah <WH3063>'s wife <WH802> died <WH4191>; and Judah <WH3063> was comforted <WH5162>, and went up <WH5927> unto his sheepshearers <WH1494> to Timnath <WH8553>, he and his friend <WH7453> Hirah <WH2437> the Adullamite <WH5726>.
And it was told <WH5046> Tamar <WH8559>, saying <WH559>, Behold your father in law <WH2524> goes up <WH5927> to Timnath <WH8553> to shear <WH1494> his sheep <WH6629>.

And she put <WH5493> her widow <WH491>'s garments <WH899> off <WH5493> from her <WH3680>, and covered her with a veil <WH6809>, and wrapped herself <WH5968>, and sat in <WH3427> a open <WH5869> place <WH6607>, which is by the way <WH1870> to Timnath <WH8553>; for she saw <WH7200> that Shelah <WH7956> was grown <WH1431>, and she was not given <WH5414> unto him to wife <WH802>.
When Judah <WH3063> saw her <WH7200>, he thought <WH2803> her to be a prostitute <WH2181>; because she had covered <WH3680> her face <WH6440>.

And he turned <WH5186> unto her by the way <WH1870>, and said <WH559>, Go to <WH3051>, I pray you let me come in <WH935> unto you <WH3045> (for he knew not that she was his daughter in law <WH3618>.) And she said <WH559>, What will you give <WH5414> me <WH935>, that you may come in unto me?
And he said <WH559>, I will send <WH7971> you a kid <WH5795> from the flock <WH6629>. And she said <WH559>, will you give <WH5414> me a pledge <WH6162>, until you send it <WH7971>?

And he said <WH559>, What <WH834> pledge <WH6162> shall I give <WH5414> you And she said <WH559>, Your signet <WH2368>, and your bracelets <WH6616>, and your staff <WH4294> that is in your hand <WH3027>. And he gave <WH5414> it her <WH935>, and came in unto her <WH2029>, and she conceived by him.
And she arose <WH6965>, and went away <WH3212>, and laid by <WH5493> her veil <WH6809> from her <WH3847>, and put on the garments <WH899> of her widowhood <WH491>.

And Judah <WH3063> sent <WH7971> the kid <WH1423> by the hand <WH3027> of his friend <WH7453> the Adullamite <WH5726>, to receive <WH3947> his pledge <WH6162> from the woman <WH802>'s hand <WH3027>: but he found her not <WH4672>.

Then he asked <WH7592> the men <WH582> of that place <WH4725>, saying <WH559>, Where is the prostitute <WH6948>, that was openly <WH5869> by the way side <WH1870>? And they said <WH559>, There was no prostitute <WH6948> in this place <WH2088>.

And he returned <WH7725> to Judah <WH3063>, and said <WH559>, I cannot <WH3808> find <WH4672> her <WH582>; and also the men of the place <WH4725> said <WH559>, that there was no prostitute in this place <WH6948>.
And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559>, Let her take <WH3947> it to her <WH937>, lest we be shamed: behold <WH7971>, I sent this kid <WH1423>, and you have not found her <WH4672>.

And it came to pass about three <WH7969> months <WH2320> after <WH5046>, that it was told Judah <WH3063>, saying <WH559>, Tamar <WH8559> your daughter in law <WH3618> has played the prostitute <WH2181>; and also <WH2030>, behold, she is with child by prostitution <WH2183>. And Judah <WH3063> said <WH559>, Bring her forth <WH3318>, and let her be burnt <WH8313>.

When she was brought forth <WH3318>, she sent <WH7971> to her father in law <WH2524>, saying <WH559>, By the man <WH376>, whose these are <WH2030>, am I with child: and she said <WH559>, Discern <WH5234>, I pray you <WH2858>, whose are these, the signet, and bracelets <WH6616>, and staff <WH4294>.

And Judah <WH3063> acknowledged <WH5234> them <WH559>, and said, She has been more righteous <WH6663> than I <WH5414>; because that I gave her not to Shelah <WH7956> my son <WH1121>. And he knew her <WH3045> again no more <WH3254>.
And it came to pass in the time <WH6256> of her hardship <WH3205>, that <WH8380>, behold, twins were in her womb <WH990>.

And it came to pass <WH3205>, when she travailed, that the one put out <WH5414> his hand <WH3027>: and the midwife <WH3205> took <WH3947> and bound <WH7194> upon his hand <WH3027> a scarlet thread <WH8144>, saying <WH559>, This came out <WH3318> first <WH7223>.

And it came to pass <WH7725>, as he drew back his hand <WH3027>, that <WH251>, behold, his brother came out <WH3318>: and she said <WH559>, How have you broken forth <WH6555>? This breach <WH6556> be upon you <WH8034>. Therefore his name was called <WH7121> Perez <WH6557>.
And afterward <WH310> came out <WH3318> his brother <WH251>, that had the scarlet thread <WH8144> upon his hand <WH3027>: and his name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Zarah <WH2226>.
